about.label: About
about.marquee: Nothing more exciting in your life than browsing 'About' pages on the Internet?
about.intro: Recomend is a space dedicated to discovering, recommending, and organizing movies. Everything is designed to provide word-of-mouth with the best digital support possible. Our approach is focused on people and their relationships in the age of self-centered consumption, or rather 'recommended for you.'

slogan.1: It‚Äôs ad-free and without dubious promises. üçÜ
slogan.2: It‚Äôs both a social network and a tool.
slogan.4: It‚Äôs amateur in the truest sense of the word.

about.last: Recomend can be used alone or with others, in public or private, day or night, but never in front of a movie, please focus!

team.label: The Team
team.intro: Recomend was created by two brothers passionate about cinema who love investing their time in overly ambitious projects that may never see the light of day.

yoann.name: Yoann
yoann.description: A hyperactive Architect-Engineer who can't be satisfied with just one job (the real start-up nation), Yoann is the originator of the idea to create a movie map, which initially had the modest ambition of being a poster for his bathroom. With Loup‚Äôs arrival, the goals skyrocketed, and feeling a bit overwhelmed, he handles all the graphic design for the map and the site, as well as all the communications (even though he doesn‚Äôt like it). He also shares his opinions on UX/UI and suggests many features without fully grasping how difficult they are to code (he‚Äôs made some progress).

loup.name: Loup
loup.description: A complete self-taught individual who still managed to pursue studies that led to unpaid unemployment before the age of 25. A true jack-of-all-trades, Loup handles the web design by coding an interface aimed to be as user-friendly as possible. Loup would like to thank all the coding forums that answered his (very) numerous questions, as well as all the Indian YouTubers who guided him like adoptive fathers throughout these months. His mother, meanwhile, is convinced that he has been enslaved by his brother for this project (he‚Äôs fine, mom).

team.last: To connect with us or other community members, join our <link>Discord</link>!

pricing.label: Pricing
pricing.intro: This subscription model is primarily a way to support the project and help it continue to grow. The premium features are bonuses for advanced use of Recomend, justifying a small financial contribution. We will always maintain the option to access the site for free, without ads, and without feeling restricted.
pricing.subdescription: *If the extremely low price of this subscription is still beyond your means, please refer to your liberal government responsible for your loss of purchasing power.

paragraph.1: As you might guess with our non-commercial profiles, we haven‚Äôt quite figured out what a business model could currently do for us...
paragraph.2: If Recomend‚Äôs future requires it, we‚Äôll look into it by surrounding ourselves with the right people‚Äîor at least people more interested in it than we are.
paragraph.3: In the meantime, let‚Äôs be honest, there are other things to focus on.

paragraph.1: All the metadata used on Recomend is provided by <link>The Movie Database (TMDb)</link> through the platform‚Äôs API. We‚Äôre doing just like everyone else, like good sheep.
paragraph.2: For any errors or missing films, please refer to <link>TMDb</link>.

resources.label: Resources
resources.intro: This isn‚Äôt really related to cinema, but here‚Äôs a list of sites we like:

contact-support.label: Contact & Support
contact-support.help-center: Find answers to your existential questions in our <link>Help Center</link>.
contact-support.contact-us: To simply get in touch with us: <link>contact@recomend.app</link>

quote.label: Quote
quote.quote: ¬´ I hate the word professional. All the actors and others who say: I‚Äôm a professional, I‚Äôm a pro! What‚Äôs that about? Is there a sadder word? Because amateur comes from the word love. You have to do things for love, otherwise we‚Äôre fools. ¬ª
quote.author: Orson Wells
quote.subdescription: *We hesitated to include it because it can quickly sound pretentious, but it reflects our mood about the project. However, if you don‚Äôt like it, we‚Äôll remove it.
